info.brief_description: An interactive with an emphasis on male possessions, but female possessions also welcome!
info.description:
First, you can pick the character perspective.

Jake: an average 18 year old. 5'8" light tanned skin and shaggy brown hair. Cute enough. Fit enough. Likable enough. Yet he has never stood out, and he knows it. His one strength is his intellect. He has often wondered what it would be like to see life from a different perspective.

Smith: Jake's 24 year-old big brother. 6'0" Also lightly tanned skin with military cropped brown hair. He's a marine with a sculpted and toned body. Looks very frat-boy, but much more muscular. He gets to be home for a few weeks, but the pain and devastation of war has him wishing there was a way to be someone else and have a distraction from his recent experiences.

Brandon: Jake's 14 year-old younger brother. 5'8" He actually ended up blonde, but he's on track to look much more like Smith when he's older. Very lean and fit for his age, and he's entered a major growth spurt. He'll be taller than Jake soon. Brandon is resentful of all of the older men in his family, especially his father, since they constantly underestimate him.

Richard: Jake's 43 year-old father. The man was just 19 when he knocked up the woman he would end up marrying and who would end up giving birth to Smith and all of his other children. He's a single father now since she passed away several years ago. He hasn't gone gray yet and is still very fit, handsome, and youthful. He could definitely pass for a 34 year-old man. He’s always hidden a secret though that he’s very bisexual.



The method of possession is going to be spiritual/astral. The character's body transforms into an astral form, meaning that possessions can be indefinite since there is no original body to have to worry about.

Characters do not get access to the memories of the host unless they merge. Merging is permanent and involves the possessor taking over the dormant astral version inside their host. Essentially entering and sealing themselves inside their host’s soul. This merge process is permanent and makes that their new base body. The old them is gone forever. There is no limit on how many merges can happen, but be mindful that too many merges could result in lots of characters disappearing forever.

Anyone can be possessed. Male or female. Though I obviously prefer male hosts. But totally free game. Only thing I ask is no kid stuff. We’re already pushing things with the 14 year old Brandon character. That’s as young as I’d like any participants to be.

Gay sex is encouraged, but not the only form allowed. Any sex is fine, just again—no one younger than Brandon.

No killing characters unless it’s a merge.

Hosts can put up a good fight during the possession process, but will not remember a thing. Possessions of sleeping victims are much easier.

The person with the powers can share their power with other people. This can either be a one-time sort of thing where our main character manually transfers someone into a host’s body or the main character can grant someone else free reign of the possession abilities. The main character is the alpha though and can take back any granted powers and can never be possessed by another character.

Mind control is allowed. The main character can temporarily control other characters via stereotypical mind control. More permanent changes to characters’ minds should only happen as a direct result of being possessed. As in the possessor manually changed aspects of the host’s mind or super longterm possessions permanently altered the host to be more like how the main character was while living the host’s life.

HAVE FUN!!!
